# cellClass

**Type Property**

Returns the `NSBrowserCell` class.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var cellClass: AnyClass { get }
```

## Return Value

Always returns the `NSBrowserCell` class (even if the developer has sent a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowser/setCellClass(_:)] message to a particular instance).

## Discussion

This method is used by `NSControl` during initialization and is not meant to be used by applications.

## Managing Component Types

- **setCellClass(_:)**: Sets the class of the cell to be used by the matrices in the columns of the browser.
- **cellPrototype**: The prototype `NSCell` for displaying items in the matrices in the columns of the browser.
